metadata.name: Double Deluxe #1/30
metadata.description:
2500 x 3125 22.5MB high resolution image

When the sun glows red and pink over Jervis Bay, the combination of the whitest sand reflecting the sky and lighting up the crystal clear water in a perfect Aquamarine hue is an aerial photographers dream. 

This image is the third in a set and a special edition awarded to my best supporters on my Nifty Gateway Drop - The Bay of Plenty. Those who collected an edition of 'The North Dawn' and bid on 'The Bay of Plenty' received access to claim their edition of 'Double Deluxe'

Thank you for your support my friends.
